amendment.description: To redesignate the project for navigation, Saco River, Maine.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4887 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4887 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S8977; text: CR S8977) To redesignate the project for navigation, Saco River, Maine.
